about_the_game:
CASTING CALL!


[/b]We’re on the hunt for contestants to join the pilot episode of the already M-E awards winning Deathrun TV.

Think you have what it takes to conquer common sense and become the ultimate celebrity? [/b]

SIGN UP NOW




Terms and conditions apply
Liability
In no event shall we be liable for any claims, penalties, financial losses, loss of hearing, loss of bowel control,adverse effects to credit score, bodily harm, howsoever arising, out of or in connection with your participation in DeathrunTV™©®™, including, without limitation, direct or indirect loss of life, consequential loss or damage of shoes, loss of profit or friends, loss of respect, loss arising from use or inability to use the podiums, loss arising from any errors or omissions in the gameshow as a result of a breach of contract, negligence, delict. Nothing in these Terms and Conditions shall exclude or limit our liability for death or personal injury caused by negligence or for any liability which cannot be excluded or limited under applicable law.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains violence and gore but it is wholly within a highly stylised animated art style

name: DEATHRUN TV Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Jump into the pilot episode of the greatest gameshow on earth and become the ultimate deathrunner. Every run is different but the quest for likes stays the same.
